input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Casio - W-218H'
  - Name='Orient Men's Kanno RA-AA0010B19B Automatic Silicone Watch'
  - Name='Orient Ray II Automatic 200m FAA02005D9 Men's Watch'
  - Name='Fossil MEN Townsman Automatic Leather Watch - Brown - Black - One size'
  - Name='Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch'
  - Name='Casio AE1000W Series Men's Digital Watch'
  - Name='Tissot PRX Watch 35mm'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Citizen ProMaster Land U822'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPG39 Watch'
  - Name='Casio protrek Men's Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Machine Chronograph Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Carlie Three-Hand Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Women's Riley Watch ES2811'
  - Name='Garmin Forerunner 165 Music'
  - Name='Men's Seiko 5 Sports Automatic'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Northeastern Huskies Blue Dive Three-Hand Date Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Stainless Steel Solar-Powered Analog Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Monty Chronograph Leather Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Fenmo Two-Tone Bracelet Strap & Leather Strap Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Machine Automatic Grey Dial Men's Watch ME3254'
  - Name='Fossil Men's SMU Mustangs Machine Stainless Steel Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio - W-218H
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic digital watch with a rugged aspect but likely less premium materials and features compared to the titanium, quartz analog Timex.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Kanno RA-AA0010B19B Automatic Silicone Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Analog automatic watch with silicone strap; shares durability and sporty nature but automatic vs quartz and silicone vs leather create modest difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Ray II Automatic 200m FAA02005D9 Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 200m water resistance and automatic analog diver watch with durable build; similar sport/outdoor use and 200m water resistance close to Timex.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil MEN Townsman Automatic Leather Watch - Brown - Black - One size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic leather strapped watch with somewhat dressier style; shares leather strap and analog movement but less sport/adventure focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport digital watch with rugged intent; differs in digital vs analog, likely less premium construction like titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio AE1000W Series Men's Digital Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Digital sport watch with digital display and basic durability; lacks premium materials and analog interface.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot PRX Watch 35mm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Analog quartz watch with modern design, durable build and sapphire crystal; less overtly rugged or 200m water resistant but shares sapphire and quartz.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic 5 Sports watch known for durability and sport design; similar size and purpose with strong water resistance and sporty features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen ProMaster Land U822
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Adventure-focused analog sport watch designed for land use; likely similar or superior water resistance and ruggedness, close in spirit and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPG39 Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sports automatic watch with analog dial and durability; similar sport/outdoor category and features but automatic rather than quartz.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio protrek Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Outdoor digital watch with rugged design and advanced features; similar adventure/outdoor focus despite digital display.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Machine Chronograph Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz chronograph with rugged style and durable build but more urban style and less technical water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Carlie Three-Hand Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: More fashion-oriented stainless steel analog watch with basic features; less rugged, no adventure focus or heavy-duty specs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Women's Riley Watch ES2811
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion watch designed for women; lacks rugged or sport features or high water resistance or titanium build.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Garmin Forerunner 165 Music
scores_with_rationales.rationale: GPS running watch with sport focus but digital interface differs greatly; advanced features but less traditional analog or premium materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Seiko 5 Sports Automatic
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Analog automatic sports watch with durable build similar to Timex's sport/adventure segment but automatic vs quartz.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Northeastern Huskies Blue Dive Three-Hand Date Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dive style analog quartz watch with decent water resistance; similar analog and date features but less premium materials noted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Stainless Steel Solar-Powered Analog Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Analog solar watch with stainless steel case and practical features; rugged and functional but no titanium and possibly less water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Monty Chronograph Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Leather strap chronograph quartz; less sport/adventure focus and no enhanced water resistance or titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Fenmo Two-Tone Bracelet Strap & Leather Strap Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion watch with mixed bracelet and leather strap options; less rugged, no specific adventure features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Machine Automatic Grey Dial Men's Watch ME3254
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic watch with rugged aesthetic and metal case; shares rugged look but different movement and no titanium or high water resistance noted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's SMU Mustangs Machine Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stainless steel automatic watch with sporty look but more urban style; less outdoor/adventure oriented and no titanium or 200m water resistance.
